name: Singles Night at the Talking Crow
name_original: Singles Night at the Talking Crow
description:
It's Singles Night at the Talking Crow!

Get to know the locals, and maybe you'll make a match.

WASD to move, E to interact

Some bugs:

- you might get caught off the static cameras. Just move around and you're bound to reset it
- it helps to let go WASD after a camera transition to reset movement/orientation

Made by:
Alex-the-bear and Gnolfo
